subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Markus Naslund and Brandon Dubinsky scored to lift the Rangers to victory over the Tampa Bay Lightning in the opening game of the N.H.L. regular season in the capital of the Czech Republic.
snippet: Markus Naslund and Brandon Dubinsky scored to lift the Rangers to victory over the Tampa Bay Lightning in the opening game of the N.H.L. regular season in the capital of the Czech Republic.
